author: Alex Öhler
description: MUDDLE lightly roasted coffee beans in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
name: Wisdom
recipeIngredient: 20 ml Licor 43 (or other spiced vanilla liqueur)
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE lightly roasted coffee beans in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
